Uses of Package
alix.lucene.util

  • Packages that use alix.lucene.util 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    alix.lucene.analysis
    Components for lexical analysis, especially for French.
  • Classes in alix.lucene.util used by alix.lucene 
    Class Description
    Rail
    Persistent storage of full sequence of all document terms for a field.
  • Classes in alix.lucene.util used by alix.lucene.analysis 
    Class Description
    BinaryUbytes
    Data structure to write and read unsigned bytes (0-255) in a binary form suited for lucene stored field StoredField(String, BytesRef), Document.getBinaryValue(String) or binary fields BinaryDocValuesField, BinaryDocValues.
    Offsets
    Data structure to write and read the “offsets” of a document Offsets are start and end index of tokens in the source CharSequence (the text).
